data.title: Sanaya Irani became actress on mother's suggestion, rose to fame with this show

data.text:
Sanaya Irani, who won the heart of her best performance in the TV industry. She is an excellent actor and people love her fiercely. Sanaya Irani’s birthday is on September 17 and she has won the hearts of millions of viewers by her act in many TV serials. She was born in the Parsi family of Mumbai. She has made hir initial studies from Ooty. Yes, he had studied at Ooty boarding school for nearly seven years and then studied an MBA at Sydenham College.

While she was studying MBA, her mother advised her to start modeling and acting. On the mother’s advice, Sanaya stepped into the modeling world and then acted. Very few people know that Sanaya’s first modeling portfolio was made by photographer-turned-actor Boman Irani. Yes, while talking about acting, Sanaya Irani worked in a film in the year 2006 and then worked in TV serials.

All of you would have seen him for the first time in Aamir Khan and Kajol’s superhit film, but the film did not hit him much. After the film, she came to the TV industry and worked in the left right left. After the show, Sanaya became famous for the name of this love. In addition, he met when we have seen you in many TV serials like The Colour Rasiya. You may know that he married the famous TV actor Mohit Sehgal in the year 2016.
